description: System-generated unique identifier for this batch exception record.
Identifier of the maintenance work order associated with the exception encountered during batch processing.
Free-text notes describing the exception or processing issue for the maintenance work order.
User account that recorded the exception or performed the most recent action on this record.
Timestamp when this exception record was last updated in the system; used for audit and troubleshooting.
Timestamp when a user last updated this record, distinct from automated updates; likely redundant with system update time; confirm with SME.
Code indicating which batch process category created or flagged the exception; values are system-defined. Confirm code list with SME.
User account that originally created the exception record (audit field).
Timestamp when the exception record was first created (audit field).
User account that most recently modified the record (audit field), if tracked separately from system processes.
Timestamp of the most recent user-driven modification (audit field); may duplicate the general last update time; confirm behavior with SME.
